description: Reusable communication templates for social media, recruitment, and professional messaging across various platforms and channels

templates.purpose: Confirm specific vacancy interest and provide role overview
templates.template_text:
Hello [Candidate Name]!

Thank you for your interest in our open position. Could you please confirm which specific vacancy you're interested in?

Once confirmed, I'll be happy to provide you with more details about the role and next steps.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Best regards,
[Recruiter Name]

workflow_context.WF-REC-002: Step 1 - Confirm candidate interest in vacancies

templates.follow_up: If confirmed ‚Üí proceed to language assessment (TMPL-REC-002)
best_practices: Confirm specific vacancy to avoid confusion

templates.purpose: Assess candidate language skills for role requirements
templates.template_text:

‚Ä¢ Advanced

templates.qualification_criteria: Specify required level for role upfront

templates.full_name: Request for CV or Video Business Card
templates.purpose: Request candidate professional background materials with flexible format options
templates.template_text:
Great, thank you for that information!

For the next step, I'd love to learn more about your professional background. You have two options:

1. Share your CV/resume (via Instagram or Telegram: [Telegram handle])
2. Record a short video (1-3 minutes) introducing yourself and summarizing your professional experience

Whichever you're more comfortable with works for me!
templates.alternative_text:
Great, thank you for that information!

The next step is to review your professional background. Could you please share your CV/resume?

You can send it here via Instagram, or if you prefer, you can send it to me via Telegram at [Telegram handle]. Just let me know which works best for you.

I'll confirm receipt once I have it!

workflow_context.WF-REC-001: Step 6 - Follow up on candidate profiles

templates.follow_up: Upon receipt ‚Üí confirm (TMPL-REC-007) and proceed to scheduling (TMPL-REC-004)
templates.flexibility: Offer multiple submission methods to reduce friction
best_practices: Offer both CV and video options

What days and times work best for you this week or next? I'm flexible and want to find a time that's convenient for you.

Just share a few options and we'll get something on the calendar!

workflow_context.WF-REC-001: Step 3 - Confirm availability for job interviews

templates.timing: Schedule within 3-5 days of CV receipt when possible
best_practices: Provide clear interview details with timezone

templates.template_text:
Hi [Candidate Name],

No problem at all! Life happens, and I appreciate you letting me know.

Let's find a new time that works better for you. What days/times would be more convenient?

Looking forward to connecting soon!
templates.context: When candidate requests to reschedule interview

workflow_context.WF-REC-001: Step 4 - Reschedule job interviews if necessary

templates.follow_up: Once new time agreed ‚Üí send updated confirmation (TMPL-REC-004 confirmation version) with link
templates.mindset: Treat rescheduling as normal part of process, not inconvenience

templates.purpose: Confirm receipt of CV/documents sent via alternate platform
templates.template_text:
Hi [Candidate Name]!

Just confirming I received your [CV/resume/video] via [Telegram/Instagram]. Thank you for sending that over!

I'll review it and get back to you within [timeframe] about next steps.

Talk soon!
templates.context: After candidate submits materials via Telegram or other platform
templates.importance: Reduces candidate anxiety about whether materials were received

templates.purpose: Reconfirm interest after candidate indicated delay or travel
templates.template_text:
Hi [Candidate Name]!

Hope you're doing well! I wanted to follow up regarding the [vacancy name] position.

You had mentioned [travel/timing constraint] previously. Are you now available to move forward with the interview process? I wanted to make sure this opportunity is still of interest to you.

Let me know, and if so, we can get an interview scheduled!

Best,
[Recruiter Name]
templates.context: 1-2 weeks after candidate indicated delay period

workflow_context.WF-REC-001: Step 7 - Confirm interest post-travel or delay

templates.follow_up: If interested ‚Üí restart scheduling process (TMPL-REC-004); if not ‚Üí close application
templates.timing: Follow up 1-2 weeks after indicated delay period
